claim().details: Claim all pending rewards up to current block

claimGovernance().details: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

deposit(uint256).details: Deposit LP tokens into contract, must be preapproved.

doUpdatePool().details: External call for updating the pool.

emergencyWithdraw().details: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.     No rewards will payed out!

exit().details: Exit out of the contract completely, withdraw LP tokens and claim rewards

governor().details: Returns the address of the current Governor.

params._lpToken: Address of the LP token(Uniswap Pair)

isGovernor().details: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

pendingRewards(address).details: View function to see pending rewards for each account on frontend.

params._user: Address of the account we're looking up.

pendingRewards(address).return: reward Total rewards owed to this account.

startCampaign(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: start a new reward campaign.     This will calculate all rewards up to the current block at the old rate.     This ensures that we pay everyone at the promised rate before update to the new rate.

params._numBlocks: number of blocks that the campaign should last
params._startBlock: Block number that we want to start the rewards at (0 for current block)

totalOutstandingRewards().details: View function to see total outstanding rewards for the entire contract.     This is how much is owed when everyone pulls out.
totalOutstandingRewards().return: reward Total rewards owed to everyone.

transferGovernance(address).details: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete

params.claim: Boolean do we want to claim our rewards or not

initialize(address,address).notice: Initializer for setting up Liquidity Reward internal state.
